speakerBioSummary.text:
• Storm Reid stars as 'Meg' in Disney's live adaptation of the acclaimed children's novel, A Wrinkle in Time, alongside Oprah Winfrey, Reese Witherspoon, Chris Pine and Mindy Kaling.
  • Reid stars alongside Zendaya in HBO's critically-acclaimed series Euphoria.
  • She later appeared on the Netflix miniseries When They See Us, also directed by Ava DuVernay, following the Central Park five boys who were falsely prosecuted in April 1989.
  • She is well known for her role of ‘Emily' in the Oscar Award Winning feature 12 Years a Slave.
  • She will also star in the Sony's Searching 2 and the thriller film One Way.
  • She stars opposite Common, Allison Janney and Katie Holmes in Judy Greer’s directorial debut, A Happening of Monumental Proportions, which won the Audience Award for Best Spotlight film at the 2017 Bentonville Film Festival.

speakerBiography.text:
Storm Reid is best known for starring as ‘Meg’ in Disney’s live action adaptation of the acclaimed children's novel, A Wrinkle in Time, which was directed by multi-award winner Ava DuVernay.

She can currently be seen starring opposite Zendaya in the new HBO series Euphoria, and recently starred  opposite Elizabeth Moss in Universal’s The Invisible Man, as well as starring opposite David Oyelowo in Blumhouse’s Relive (which premiered at the 2019 Sundance Film Festival).

Storm also re-teamed with Ava DuVernay for When They See Us on Netflix. 

Other select film credits include the Oscar Award-Winning feature 12 Years A Slave, Blumhouse’s Sleight, and Judy Greer’s directorial debut A Happening of Monumental Proportions.

Reid’s select television credits include guest star roles on NBC’s Chicago P.D. and CBS’ NCIS: Los Angeles.
